name: 18th International Conference on Distributed Computing and Networking
content: ICDCN 2017 solicits high quality original manuscripts not submitted or being considered elsewhere. Regular papers should not exceed 10 pages, and concise papers (marked with "Concise" in the title) should not exceed 4 pages, double column including figures, tables and references in standard ACM format. Additional details may be included in a clearly-marked appendix, not exceeding one page, that will be read at the discretion of the program committee. Some papers not accepted as regular papers may be accepted as "Concise papers" with 4 ACM pages in the proceedings while full papers will be allowed 10 ACM pages. All submissions must be made electronically in printable pdf form via the EasyChair submission management system. Specific instructions for the paper submissions are available at the conference web site. Warning: It is ACM policy not to allow double submissions, where the same paper is submitted to more than one conference/journal concurrently. Any double submissions detected will be immediately rejected from all conferences/journals involved.
organizers: A.S. Ramasastri, Institute for Development and Research in Banking Technology, Hyderabad, India
